title: BreakPoint Card Game
oneLiner: A fast-paced, turn-based 3v3 tactical card battler built in Unity with online multiplayer.
highlights: Round-based turn system with cooldowns, signature charge, and status effect resolution
Online multiplayer using Mirror with synchronized gameplay state
Animated hit resolution and impact feedback for moment-to-moment clarity
Data-driven characters and abilities (JSON) to keep content scalable

title: BreakPoint Website
oneLiner: A public-facing information hub for BreakPoint players with character pages and mechanics documentation.
highlights: Character directory with detailed stat and moveset pages
Mechanics documentation designed for quick onboarding
Masonry-style card layout optimized for desktop browsing
Site content generated from the same JSON schema used by the game

title: Violet Violin Studio Website
oneLiner: A role-based lesson scheduling and content management platform for a family-run violin studio.
highlights: Role-based dashboards with real-time booking management and confirmation workflow
Scheduling system with consecutive slot validation and timezone-aware storage
Admin CMS with inline editing for text content and image galleries
Mobile-first responsive design with optimized touch interactions

title: HotSauced Team Website
oneLiner: A content-managed team hub with admin editing, sports scheduling, and lightweight RSVP workflows.
highlights: Admin-editable content sections (no code changes required)
Sports sections + Code of Conduct designed for quick access on mobile
Game-day chips with RSVP support
PIN-based RSVP flow to avoid account creation while maintaining basic access control
